title: National debt of India 2024
yAxis: National debt in billion U.S. dollars
summary: The chart at hand is a line chart where the x axis denotes Year and a y axis denotes National debt in billion U.S. dollars. In total the number of data points it has is 11.
Overall National debt in billion U.S. dollars has increased over the Year.
National debt in billion U.S. dollars is slightly increasing from 2014 to 2024.
The most drastic increase took place within the Year 2023 and 2024.
The highest National debt in billion U.S. dollars, of value 3299.94 was reached at Year 2024
The lowest National debt in billion U.S. dollars, of value 1160.56 was reported at Year 2014
